523.title: Sarabhai Vs Sarabhai
523.description: The Sarabhais, an affluent Gujarati family in South Bombay, will have you in splits with their idiosyncrasies. Be a part of their crazy lives!

7326.title: Bahu Humari Rajni_Kant
7326.description: Shaan, a scientist creates a robot, Rajni, as a one-stop-solution for humans. When he ends up marrying her, his life becomes a hilarious circus.

7662.title: May I Come in Madam
7662.description: Tired of his intrusive in-laws and lack of privacy with his wife, Kashmira, Sajan finds an escape in his authoritative yet attractive new boss, but has he?

8944.title: Ambat Goad
8944.description: The Vidhawans are a close-knit yet eccentric family. The constant banters between the three daughters-in-laws, maintains the sweet-sour meter of the house.

14465.title: KPY Champions
14465.description: Your favourite comedy kings from Kalakka Povadhu Yaaru are back for a weekly face-off to win the prestigious title! Who will you root for?

15017.title: Kya Haal Mr. Paanchal
15017.description: Kunti's innocent wish of a perfect bride for her son Kanhaiya, lands her up with five daughters-in-laws, each with a unique quality, leading to a comical ride.

1000120365.title: Badhaai Ho
1000120365.description: Getting a new sibling at 25 is the last thing Nakul expected. Will he ever come to terms with the embarrassing 'good news' of his parents being pregnant?

1000233697.title: Total Dhamaal
1000233697.description: When 50 million bucks are at stake, six eccentric people will do whatever it takes, including braving the wild. Who will win this race against time?

1260004378.title: Shararat
1260004378.description: Jiya unlocks her magical powers when she turns eighteen. With great power comes great responsibility... but in Jiya's case, it brings chaos!

1260013562.title: Chuni Panna
1260013562.description: What happens when Chuni, who is obsessed with ghosts, gets to live with one? A one-of-a-kind 'haunted' story with an added twist of a peculiar friendship!

1260014263.title: Housefull 4
1260014263.description: A set of six lovers had to part ways in 1419. Six centuries later, they meet again only to realise that they are marrying the wrong partners. Old villains and a series of mishaps turn this reincarnation drama into a comedy of errors.

1260020929.title: Shin-chan
1260020929.description: Shin-chan follows the journey of five-year-old, Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara and his family, his pet dog Shiro, neighbours, and friends in Kasukabe, Japan.

1260024619.title: Selfie with Bajrangi
1260024619.description: Ankush's life changes when he meets a mysterious nine-year-old child named Bajrangi, who is visible to nobody but him. Together, they learn the importance of togetherness, friendship, and trust.

1260041331.title: PariWar
1260041331.description: A loving father who misses his wayward quarrelsome children will stop at nothing to make sure they come home, and Kashiram Narayan knows just the right tricks.

1260055914.title: OK Computer
1260055914.description: When a self-driving car commits murder, a cyber cop and a robot rights activist team up to investigate. Who is to be held accountable? Can we really trust AI?

1260105042.title: More Than Friends
1260105042.description: Friends of 10 years, Woo-yeon and Soo, secretly harbour feelings for each other. Will their love survive the misunderstandings and missed timings?

1260125572.title: Govinda Naam Mera
1260125572.description: Wedged between a court case, a bad marriage and his girlfriend, Govinda Waghmare gets further entangled in incidents complicating his already tangled world.
1260125572.crisp: Sexual Humour, Coarse Language, Drug References

1260128800.title: Meri Saas Bhoot Hai
1260128800.description: Gaura’s world goes into a tailspin after her deceased mother-in-law haunts her. With a spooky-yet-sassy Saas keeping tabs, will she be able to change her fate?

1260131186.title: The Interviews
1260131186.description: Anecdotes, advice, and whatnot! Giving a witty twist to job interviews, Alok Kejriwal, Raghu and Rajiv put top contenders to the test, albeit with crucial tips.

1260132550.title: Pop Kaun?
1260132550.description: A proud son of a politician, name-dropping his dad is Sahil's favourite activity. Then one day he's told he is adopted. Find out who his real pop is.
